name: Critter Connections
description:
* click red screen with the mouse if the game does not start, it’s a webGl issue, and should start the game”

Critter connection is a Tetris-inspired game where you connect similar critters before they flee.

Try connecting multiple animals of the same species to create combos. 

WASD OR ARROWS to move.

Good luck.

Dpad May work on some controllers.

Model and Assets:-

Farmer Charchter:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/voxel-character-collection-7...

Terrain textures:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/handpainted-grass-gr...

Timber and house props:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/low-poly-epic-city-2...
